Reviews.Title: Good battery, chinese firmware
Reviews.Author: alepar
Reviews.Content: Chinese recovery / firmware. Issues with google apps - some apps wouldn't install \ update. Firmware wouldn't update OTA.Otherwise works as expected. Battery life is great.

Reviews.Title: GREAT PHONE NOT FOR USA , yet?
Reviews.Author: Jones9999
Reviews.Content: The phone is a great phone, it works smoothly and with no appreciable lag to screens or opening apps, HOWEVER it is not supported in the USA as it is WCDMA 2100,NO one in the USA uses that band, seems that the European model has the WCDMA 900 /2100 band. BEWARE the 2g Service in the USA is going away, AT&T; just "upgraded" its system in Portland, OR. and other major cities in the USA and the 2G system has "experienced significant DEGRADATION"That is from THREE (3) different AT&T; Reps.so where the phone would use the 2G system to make and receive calls it DOESN'T NOW. Sorry to say a GREAT phone but BAD service and no support from Lenovo in the USA " as we don't sell it in the USA there isn't a support Team or contact information for support" from Lenovo IDEA/THINK products division. I have one for sale now, it is very sad because the phone is fantastic
